title: San Francisco/Civic Center-Tenderloin
name: The New Conservatory Theatre Center
directions: half a block from Market St and the Van Ness MUNI station
hours: Box Office Hours: W-Sa 1:30PM-7PM, Su-Tu noon-3PM Show Times: Performances are typically W-Sa 8PM, Su 2PM, year round
content: The three small New Conservatory theaters present novel, musical, comic, and educational plays.
